timeline.message: Tries to apply as many timeouts as possible for the ftp/sftp client and server.

timeline.bodyText:
should this really be putIfAbsent ?
If setUpDefaultClient changes and provides a idle timeout by default, this will no longer apply but it should still apply?
timeline.author: meg1502

timeline.message: Always use our settings instead of relying on possible defaults which might or might not be set one day.
